data.convo: How was your trip to Brazil ? Did you learn anything ? I had no idea how seriously that country takes soccer ! Tell me about it . Okay . In the middle of their streets there are parks , big soccer fields as far as you can see . Really ? That's not all . They use them ! Every night men , women , children all out there till 3 and 4 a . m . Are you serious ? I don't know how they function the next day ! It's like they eat and breathe soccer !
